#!/opt/universal/python3.6/bin/python3
import re
import sys

tf_output = """${tf_output}"""

regex = r"ec2_public_ip.*\"(\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)\""
match = re.search(regex, tf_output)
if match:
    public_ip = match.group(1)
    print("[instance]")
    print(f"{public_ip} ansible_ssh_user=ec2-user")
else:
    sys.exit(1)
